name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Innovative Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in **Go lang**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **TypeScript**. Skilled in designing and implementing **Microservices architecture** and robust **API design**. Proven ability to leverage cloud technologies, including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, specializing in **cloud billing models**, **cost optimization**, and **cloud commitment management**. Adept in **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and implementing **DevOps practices** with **CI/CD** and **GitOps** methodologies. Experienced in databases like **BigQuery**, **ClickHouse**, and **Firestore**. Recognized for developing scalable and user-centric applications in fast-paced industries such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, while driving improvements through automation and a commitment to clean, efficient code. Excellent communication and collaboration skills complement my technical expertise.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed a microservices architecture leveraging **Go lang** for the backend and **React** for the frontend, improving patient management efficiency by 95% in accuracy.
Developed RESTful APIs using **Node.js** and **TypeScript**, enhancing data accuracy by 40% while implementing secure authentication and authorization with **Spring Security**.
Improved UI/UX with **React** and **Ant Design**, resulting in a 30% reduction in time to complete tasks within the system.
Implemented a notification system using **RabbitMQ**, achieving 99% on-time alert notifications to users.
Established robust CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS** CodePipeline, cutting deployment times by 80%.
Containerized applications using **Docker**, facilitating smoother deployments across multiple environments.
Managed cloud services on **AWS EKS** (Kubernetes), utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, achieving 99.9% uptime and enhanced performance via optimal Redis caching and load management.
Utilized databases like **BigQuery**, **ClickHouse**, and **Firestore** to streamline data analytics and storage, ensuring reliability and speed in querying.

Designed and implemented microservices architecture solutions using **Node.js** and **Go lang**, enhancing system scalability and maintainability.
Developed responsive user interfaces and components with **React** and **TypeScript**, improving user engagement by 30%.
Created and documented RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless integration and communication between services.
Leveraged **AWS** and **GCP** for cloud services deployment, achieving cost optimization of 20% through strategic resource utilization and billing model management.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitOps** and **Docker**, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Utilized **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, achieving high availability and reliability for deployed services.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize workflows and enhance product deliverables, ensuring excellent communication and project outcomes.

- Developed scalable **Microservices architecture** using **Go lang** and **Node.js**, improving application response times by 50%.
- Designed and implemented user-friendly interfaces with **React**, contributing to a 25% increase in user engagement.
- Created and managed RESTful APIs, utilizing **API design** principles, which enhanced system integrations across 3 major projects.
- Collaborated in a **CI/CD** pipeline setup using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, leading to a 40% reduction in deployment times.
- Leveraged cloud services like **AWS** and **GCP** for optimized resource management, achieving a 20% decrease in operational costs.
- Conducted thorough database management using **Firestore** and **ClickHouse**, ensuring data integrity and scalability for **300K+** records.
- Effectively communicated technical solutions and collaborated across teams, enhancing project delivery timelines by 15%.
